scenario: Nvidia was the best-performing Dow Jones stock in 2024, rising 171%, followed by Walmart at 72%, American Express at 58%, Goldman Sachs at 48%, and Amazon at 44%. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 13% in 2024, while the S&P 500 soared 23%. Nvidia's success was attributed to its consistent earnings beats and benefits from artificial intelligence enthusiasm. Other top-performing Dow Jones stocks included Walmart, which saw success in its e-commerce expansion, American Express, a financial stalwart, and Goldman Sachs, which achieved consistent year-over-year earnings-per-share growth.
